title: Trending Ep 9/18: TikTok, Shia Labeouf, Herman Cain, The View, Rosh Hashanah
itunes:title: Trending Ep 9/18: TikTok, Shia Labeouf, Herman Cain, The View, Rosh Hashanah
description:
On this episode of the Trending Zeitgeist Miles and Laci discuss Tik Tok potentially getting banned, Shia playing Spicoli in the Fast Times at Ridgemont High reunion reading, HermanCain.com posting anti-COVID, anti-Mask sentiments despite the obvious hypocrisy, Kim Klacik going off on Joy Behar on the View, and Shanah Tovah to all observing Rosh Hashanah!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
